- IP

- Windows

- - `ping $IP`

![](image/607348-20160312220145210-443719950.png)

 

- - `tracert $IPIP`

![](image/607348-20160312220158054-2124916124.png)



- - `telnet $IP $portIP`

- - `netstat`

![](image/607348-20160312220227866-1298265423.png)


- Linux
 
- - `ping $IP`

- - `traceroute $IPIP`

- - `mtr -ni 0.1 $IP`

![](image/607348-20160312221617569-1834112731.png)


- - `nc -vz $IP $PORTIP`

![](image/607348-20160312221825819-331058027.png)

Post._content:
### 
LinuxUNIX1991105LinuxLinux

LinuxLinux

*** 

### 
<font color=blue>POST-->BIOS-->MBR(GRUB)-->Kernel-->Init-->Runlevel</font>

![](image/607348-20151229231206354-919070678.png)


* BIOS

	BIOS(Basic Input/Output System)ROMCPU()BIOSBIOSBIOSBIOSMBRMBRBootloaderMBR(PSBIOS)BootLoaderBIOSBootLoader

 

* MBR

	MBR(Master Boot Record)MBR512bytes446bytesBootLoader64bytes2bytesMBR

 

* GRUB

	GRUB(Grand Unified Bootloader)

	* Stage1MBRBootloader(stage2)MBRstage2stage1_5

	* Stage1_5

	* Stage2GRUB/boot/grub/grub.confKernelKernelKernelGRUBKernel

		PS/bootGRUBgrub/grub/grub.conf

		grub.conf:
	```
#boot=/dev/sda

default=0    #title0

timeout=5    #

splashimage=(hd0,0)/boot/grub/splash.xpm.gz  #GRUB

hiddenmenu   #

title CentOS (2.6.18-194.el5PAE)    #

	root (hd0,0)       #

	kernel /vmlinuz-2.6.18-194.el5PAE ro root=LABEL=/   #

	initrd /initrd-2.6.18-194.el5PAE.img                #ramdisk
	```
		
* Kernel

	KernelKernelLinuxKernelGRUBKernelinitrd

	initrd(Initial RAM Disk)stage2(rootfs)KernelKernelrootfsinitrdKernelinitrdrootfsinitrd

	Kernel()/sbin/initinit

 
* Init

	initOS/etc/inittab()/etc/rc.d/rc.sysinitOS()

	* udevselinux;
	* /etc/sysctl.conf;
	* ;
	* ;
	* ;
	* ;
	* ;
	* RAIDLVM;
	* ;
	* /etc/fstab;
	* PID

	/etc/rc.d/rc.local


* Runlevel

	runlevelinitLinux

	0

	1()

	2

	3

	4

	5

	6

	/etc/rc.d/rc

	Runlevel 0  /etc/rc.d/rc0.d/

	Runlevel 1  /etc/rc.d/rc1.d/

	Runlevel 2  /etc/rc.d/rc2.d/

	Runlevel 3  /etc/rc.d/rc3.d/

	Runlevel 4  /etc/rc.d/rc4.d/

	Runlevel 5  /etc/rc.d/rc5.d/

	Runlevel 6  /etc/rc.d/rc6.d/

	K\*S\*KS

***
 

###

	kernel /vmlinuz-2.6.18-194.el5PAE ro root=LABEL=/   #

	initrd /initrd-2.6.18-194.el5PAE.img                #ramdisk

Post.title: SSL/TLS
Post._content:
### 
webHTTP

* 
* 
* 

1994SSLWebSSLIETFSSL1999TLS RFC 524620088 RFC 6176 20113web

*** 

### SSL/TLS

TLSTransport Layer SecuritySSLSecure Sockets Layer

TLS

* 
* 
* 

***

### 

TLSTLS Record Layer,TLS handshake protocol

* Record Layer

	headerMessage Authentication Code (MAC) hashheader5 bytes(1bytes),(2bytes)(2bytes)header16384bytes

* Handshake Protocol

	TLS

	![](image/607348-20160224221716880-1764174375.png)

 

TCPTLS

* ClientHelloClientTLSSessionID()Server

* ServerHelloServerSSLSessionIDClient

* ServerCertificatesServer()Client((CA))ServerClientCerficate Request

* ServerHelloDoneServerHelloServerServer Hello DoneServerHello 

* ClientKeyExchageClientServerPreMaster SecretServerServer

* ClientFinishdClientChangeCipherSpec()ServerMaster Secret(PreMaster Secret)Finish

* Server FinishdSeverClientChangeCipherSpecMaster SecretFinish

Finish

Master Secret

***

### 

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transport_Layer_Security](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transport_Layer_Security)

[https://www.sans.org/reading-room/whitepapers/protocols/ssl-tls-beginners-guide-1029](https://www.sans.org/reading-room/whitepapers/protocols/ssl-tls-beginners-guide-1029)

[https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/257591](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/257591)

Post.title: WEBCSP
Post._content:
### 
(Content-Security-PolicyCSP)webXSS

***

### 

![](image/607348-20151208141131543-187859986.png)

[caniuse.com/contentsecuritypolicy](http://caniuse.com/#feat=contentsecuritypolicy) & [Mozilla](https://hacks.mozilla.org/2013/05/content-security-policy-1-0-lands-in-firefox-aurora/)

***

### 

Content-Security-Policy ;

           |                    |     
 ------------- | ---------------------  | ----- 
 default-src   | 'self' cdn.example.com | 
 script-src    | 'self' js.example.com  | JavaScript
 style-src     | 'self' css.example.com | 
 img-src       | 'self' img.example.com | 
 connect-src   | 'self'                 | XMLHttpRequest(AJAX),WebSocketEventSource400
 font-src      | font.example.com       | 
 object-src    | 'self'                 | .eg,<object\>,<embed\><applet\>
 media-src     | media.example.com      | audiovideo.eg,HTML5,<audio\>,<video\>
 frame-src     | 'self'                 | 
 sandbox       | allow-forms allow-scripts |iframe sanbox,,,.,:allow-forms,allow-same-origin,allow-scripts,allow-top-navigation
 report-uri    | /some-report-uri       |-Report-onlyHTTP,()

***

### 

*none

           |                    |     
 ------------- | ---------------------  | ----- 
 \*            | img-src *              | 
 'none'        | object-src 'none'      | 
 'self'        | script-src 'self'      | 
 data:         | img-src 'self' data:   | 
 domain.ccc.com | img-src img.ccc.com   | 
 *.ccc.com     | img-src *.ccc.com      | 
 https://img.ccc.com | img-src https://img.ccc.com | https
 https:        | img-src https:         | https
 'unsafe-inline' | script-src 'unsafe-inline' | ,,Style attribute,onclick,scripttag bodies
 'unsafe-eval' | script-src 'unsafe-eval' | eval()

*** 

### 

* 

    `default-src 'self';`

* *

    `default-src 'self' https://*.ccc.com:*;`

* 

	`script-src 'self';`

* www.ccc.com

	`script-src 'self' www.ccc.com;`

***

### 

* AJAXCSS

	`default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self'; img-src 'self'; style-src 'self';`
 

* 

	F12

	<font color=red>Refused to load the script 'script-uri' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "your CSP directive".</font>

	Firefox  Web Developer Tools 

	<font color=red>Content Security Policy: A violation occurred for a report-only CSP policy ("An attempt to execute inline scripts has been blocked"). The behavior was allowed, and a CSP report was sent.</font>
 

 

*** 

### 

[http://content-security-policy.com/](http://content-security-policy.com/)

[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/CSP](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/CSP)

[http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/](http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/)

### 
(Content-Security-PolicyCSP)webXSS

***

### 

![](image/607348-20151208141131543-187859986.png)

[caniuse.com/contentsecuritypolicy](http://caniuse.com/#feat=contentsecuritypolicy) & [Mozilla](https://hacks.mozilla.org/2013/05/content-security-policy-1-0-lands-in-firefox-aurora/)

***

### 

Content-Security-Policy ;

           |                    |     
 ------------- | ---------------------  | ----- 
 default-src   | 'self' cdn.example.com | 
 script-src    | 'self' js.example.com  | JavaScript
 style-src     | 'self' css.example.com | 
 img-src       | 'self' img.example.com | 
 connect-src   | 'self'                 | XMLHttpRequest(AJAX),WebSocketEventSource400
 font-src      | font.example.com       | 
 object-src    | 'self'                 | .eg,<object\>,<embed\><applet\>
 media-src     | media.example.com      | audiovideo.eg,HTML5,<audio\>,<video\>
 frame-src     | 'self'                 | 
 sandbox       | allow-forms allow-scripts |iframe sanbox,,,.,:allow-forms,allow-same-origin,allow-scripts,allow-top-navigation
 report-uri    | /some-report-uri       |-Report-onlyHTTP,()

***

### 

*none

           |                    |     
 ------------- | ---------------------  | ----- 
 \*            | img-src *              | 
 'none'        | object-src 'none'      | 
 'self'        | script-src 'self'      | 
 data:         | img-src 'self' data:   | 
 domain.ccc.com | img-src img.ccc.com   | 
 *.ccc.com     | img-src *.ccc.com      | 
 https://img.ccc.com | img-src https://img.ccc.com | https
 https:        | img-src https:         | https
 'unsafe-inline' | script-src 'unsafe-inline' | ,,Style attribute,onclick,scripttag bodies
 'unsafe-eval' | script-src 'unsafe-eval' | eval()

*** 

### 

* 

    `default-src 'self';`

* *

    `default-src 'self' https://*.ccc.com:*;`

* 

	`script-src 'self';`

* www.ccc.com

	`script-src 'self' www.ccc.com;`

***

### 

* AJAXCSS

	`default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self'; img-src 'self'; style-src 'self';`
 

* 

	F12

	<font color=red>Refused to load the script 'script-uri' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "your CSP directive".</font>

	Firefox  Web Developer Tools 

	<font color=red>Content Security Policy: A violation occurred for a report-only CSP policy ("An attempt to execute inline scripts has been blocked"). The behavior was allowed, and a CSP report was sent.</font>
 

 

*** 

### 

[http://content-security-policy.com/](http://content-security-policy.com/)

[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/CSP](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/CSP)

[http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/](http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/)
Post.content:
(Content-Security-PolicyCSP)webXSS

caniuse.com/contentsecuritypolicy & Mozilla

Content-Security-Policy ;
default-src self cdn.example.com
script-src self js.example.com JavaScript
style-src self css.example.com
img-src self img.example.com
connect-src self XMLHttpRequest(AJAX),WebSocketEventSource400
font-src font.example.com
object-src self .eg,,
media-src media.example.com audiovideo.eg,HTML5,,
frame-src self
sandbox allow-forms allow-scripts iframe sanbox,,,.,:allow-forms,allow-same-origin,allow-scripts,allow-top-navigation
report-uri /some-report-uri -Report-onlyHTTP,()

*none
* img-src *
none object-src none
self script-src self
data: img-src self data:
domain.ccc.com img-src img.ccc.com
*.ccc.com img-src *.ccc.com
https://img.ccc.com img-src https://img.ccc.com https
https: img-src https: https
unsafe-inline script-src unsafe-inline ,,Style attribute,onclick,scripttag bodies
unsafe-eval script-src unsafe-eval eval()

  • default-src 'self';

  • *

    default-src 'self' https://*.ccc.com:*;

  • script-src 'self';

  • www.ccc.com

    script-src 'self' www.ccc.com;

  • AJAXCSS

    default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self'; img-src 'self'; style-src 'self';

  • F12

    Refused to load the script script-uri because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: your CSP directive.

    Firefox Web Developer Tools

    Content Security Policy: A violation occurred for a report-only CSP policy (An attempt to execute inline scripts has been blocked). The behavior was allowed, and a CSP report was sent.

http://content-security-policy.com/

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/CSP

http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/
